item.description:
Founded by composer and arranger Lorenzo Carrano, the Jazz Writersâ€™ Collective has been lending its voice to some of the most talented emerging composers around Boston since 2010. Showcasing some of the finest young players the local Jazz scene has to offer, the band has been conquering the heart of its audiences since its inception thanks to its outstanding performances and unique collaborations with its featured artists. As a ten piece orchestra, Jazz Writers' Collective combines the power of a big band and the intimacy of a chamber ensemble; its ever growing repertoire ranges from post be-bop and cool to modern classical music.

Come for a night of great music, support up and coming talent!

Jazz Writers' Collective

Tomer Ron Trumpet
Urs Burkhard Trumpet
Ryo Konishi Alto Sax.
Gabriele Milozzi Tenor Sax.
Joe Ricard Trombone
Sawa Tamezane Baritone Sax.
Mina Yu Piano
Yuto Kanazawa Guitar
Max Ridley Bass
Daniele Cavalca Drums
Lorenzo Carrano Conductor
item.name: Jazz Writers' Collective @ Ryles Jazz Club
